title: Chicken Marsala, My Way
ingredients: ['675g skinless boneless chicken breast fillets, pounded thin', '125g plain flour for coating', '2 eggs, beaten', '60g butter, divided', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '250ml chicken stock', '125ml dry Marsala wine', '175g mushrooms, sliced', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon Oxo liquid concentrated beef stock', '2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice', '4 tablespoons grated Parmigiano Reggiano (Parmesan) cheese for topping', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
